name: Solar System (itch) (salvaben)
description:
This is an interactive solar system made for CAS 117 at Michigan State University. My first game! Left click to follow celestial bodies, and enjoy the random comet sightings

I added to this game the following elements each with material, behavior, and audio assets:

1. Mars

2. Jupiter

3. Saturn

Credits:

Created by Ben Salva

Guidance by Brian Winn.
